item.title: Ticketing System
item.description: You need a ticketing system RIGHT NOW! Context A ticketing system can be your first step in having your own helpdesk experience at home. This can be free and paid, in cloud or on prem which makes this a super nerdy/fun experience. We will be using Freshdesks’ ticketing system as it provides quite good controls. Setup Go to https://www.freshworks.com/freshdesk/signup/ Follow the signup process Note: “company email” can be your personal email as well.
